::Ender::
       He frowned and looked around.  He took out one gun and held the muzzle 
to his head.  He then reached out to give the gun to Razor Claw.  He didn't 
speak because he had decided that someone was probably listening.

--part1_45.be741d3.28cbbced_boundary
